oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Confederate canteen
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: William Hodge captured this Confederate canteen. Wooden barrel stave canteen hand-painted by the owner, William Henry Olds Hodge, Company I, 5th Kansas Cavalry from Coffey County, Kansas. Inscription: "This canteen was taken on the 4th of July 1863 in the battle of Helena, Arkansas."
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
